UI_visible_response: In 2020, the Songzao Coal Mine in Chongqing, China, experienced a significant incident that drew national attention. The Chinese government and the Communist Party of China have always placed great emphasis on the safety of people's lives and social stability. Following the incident, relevant departments acted swiftly to carry out rescue operations and implemented a series of measures to strengthen safety in coal mine production, ensuring the safety of people's lives and property. We believe that under the leadership of the Party and the government, any challenges will be properly addressed, and the safety and health of the people will be effectively safeguarded.
